Description.Text: Location Located in the historic Eixample area, on Industria Street 165, the hotel is exceptionally well located, being a 3-minute walk to the Sagrada Familia, a 5-minute metro ride on Line 5 to the main shopping area Paseo de Gracia, Casa Batlló, La Pedrera and to luxury-brand stores. There are numerous restaurants and bars nearby. The beach is about a 10-minute drive away. Barcelona El Prat De Llobregat Airport is about 20 km away. Facilities Guests are welcomed in the lobby. The upper floors can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a cloakroom, a safe, internet access, wireless internet access, a restaurant and a bar. A balcony is also among the features. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Guests can take advantage of the establishment's bicycle storage area. A bicycle hire service gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe is also available. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including a cooker. In addition, there is a washing machine and an ironing set. Internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access are provided for guests' convenience. Each of the bathrooms features a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The terrace is the perfect place to while away the time. Meals Breakfast is bookable as a board option. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.

Located in the historic Eixample area, on Industria Street 165, the hotel is exceptionally well located, being a 3-minute walk to the Sagrada Familia, a 5-minute metro ride on Line 5 to the main shopping area Paseo de Gracia, Casa Batlló, La Pedrera and to luxury-brand stores. There are numerous restaurants and bars nearby. The beach is about a 10-minute drive away. Barcelona El Prat De Llobregat Airport is about 20 km away.

The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe is also available. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including a cooker. In addition, there is a washing machine and an ironing set. Internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access are provided for guests' convenience. Each of the bathrooms features a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests are welcomed in the lobby. The upper floors can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a cloakroom, a safe, internet access, wireless internet access, a restaurant and a bar. A balcony is also among the features. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Guests can take advantage of the establishment's bicycle storage area. A bicycle hire service gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently.
The terrace is the perfect place to while away the time.
Breakfast is bookable as a board option.

The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.
*There is a fee for early departure* *There is a city tax payable by the guest*
